technologies.name: Cart Functionality
technologies.description: Websites that have a shopping cart or checkout page, either using a known ecommerce platform or a custom solution.

technologies.name: Drupal
technologies.description: Drupal is a free and open-source web content management framework.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Debian
technologies.description: Debian is a Linux software which is a free open-source software.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Apache HTTP Server
technologies.description: Apache is a free and open-source cross-platform web server software.

technologies.name: OWL Carousel
technologies.description: OWL Carousel is an enabled jQuery plugin that lets you create responsive carousel sliders.

technologies.name: AddToAny
technologies.description: AddToAny is a universal sharing platform that can be integrated into a website by use of a web widget or plugin.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: Lodash
technologies.description: Lodash is a JavaScript library which provides utility functions for common programming tasks using the functional programming paradigm.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Google Font API
technologies.description: Google Font API is a web service that supports open-source font files that can be used on your web designs.

technologies.name: Font Awesome
technologies.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and Less.

technologies.name: Linkedin Insight Tag
technologies.description: LinkedIn Insight Tag is a lightweight JavaScript tag that powers conversion tracking, website audiences, and website demographics.

technologies.name: Sendinblue
technologies.description: Sendinblue is an email marketing solution for small and medium-sized businesses that want to send and automate email marketing campaigns.

technologies.name: OVHcloud
technologies.description: OVHcloud is a global, cloud provider delivering hosted private cloud, public cloud, and dedicated server solutions.

technologies.name: Microsoft 365
technologies.description: Microsoft 365 is a line of subscription services offered by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft Office product line.

technologies.name: Linkedin Ads
technologies.description: Linkedin Ads is a paid marketing tool that offers access to Linkedin social networks through various sponsored posts and other methods.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.
